Post_Title: Seemingly the only people that get "possessed" by demons and jinn are people who believe in them, so by no longer believing in them, you would no longer get possessed
post_text:
You never hear of NASA scientists or Quantum physicists getting possessed by demons/jinns. When you look at online stories or YouTube videos, the overwhelming amount of cases of supposed demon/jinn possession seem to be from less educated, less rational people who tend to believe in demons/jinn. 

So conventional wisdom would suggest if someone was actually afraid of being possessed by some demon/jinns, then by no longer believing in them you could theoretically gain immunity from these supposedly supernatural creatures. You will no longer need to get an exorcism/ruqyah after the fact. 

I'm not advocating that you need to leave religion in order to avoid possession. You can still believe in other concepts like heaven/hell or God if that floats your boat. All I'm arguing is that a practical solution to not getting possessed, is to not believe in the things that supposedly posses people. 

Just like the cliche lessons we were taught as kids "what you don't fear has no power over you". Or maybe that was from Monster's Inc. I forget.
